doc.title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
doc.author: Alexander Trufanov
doc.excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Pilot by Alexander Trufanov

main.head: Pilot
main.p: Alexander is a 25-year-old artist from Moscow. He discovered his passion for drawing while attending technical university and dove into the field with a passion. Alexander's work often employs science fiction themes and characters, a personal favorite of his. He is currently employed as an artist in the gaming industry.
